name: Maria D-Costa
comment: awesome bike it's not much heavy bike very charming bike and also is very comfortable seats i will refer to my family members and friends to purchase the bike and new models comfortable bike thank you

name: Antheny
comment: Best for long ride, Look is awesome but handle vibrates if you can handle it your done.It has good comfort for long rides.I was waited for 6 months to buy this es bs6 and disappointed after a month of ownership.I never crossed 60 km speed and driven 478 kms.

name: solim Sultan
comment: Awesome bike and comfortable bike and the best thing is that company is giving best after sale service

name: D Costa
comment: I purchased it in 2019 Its good by its looks and for riding but its not worth buying it because the service is not valid. Everytime they put up something this and that is not working.

name: Redditch
comment: It was not expected from the company that if the silencer gets damaged within 2 years..

name: Suvo Khan
comment: After sales support sucks. Cannot imagine how such an established brand can be so poor in aftersales cs. 1 year and no resolution
